text: Ezɨ me Josuan akam ikaragha ghaze, “Gumazir ekiam, e kamaghɨn oraki, Ikiavɨra Itir God, ian God, uan ingangarir gumazim Moses mɨgɨa ghaze, ia izɨ kagh otivightɨ, a nguazir kaba bar da isɨ ia danɨngam, egh nguazir kabar itir gumazamiziba bar me gasɨghasigham. Kamaghɨn, e ian atiatigha uari bagha nɨghnɨgha ifavarir kam gami.
